answers.answer: Hello,Frequent urge and passing or urine esp at night is called nocturia. Causes are sleep apnea, hyperparathyroidism, chronic renal failure, urinary incontinence, bladder infection, Interstitial Cystitis, diabetes, heart failure and benign prostatic hyperplasia.You need to consult a urologist and get your blood sugar levels, urine examination, urine culture, PSA, prostate examination and kidney function tests done. All these possibilities also need to be ruled out one by one. I sincerely hope that helps. Take care and regards.

question: i feel every time specially in night have to urinate.I go for that little bit amount of urine came out, after some time i feel again.I went of to general physician he has given me some anti-biotic tab i took it then i feeled better for some days after releaving it now i am having same problem.I am not having any problem to urinate it does not burn and what ever.If any body having genuine idea about this give me responce as early.i will be thankfull to the sameregardrehan
title: Urine problem
